entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-11-20
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • JIT: Assertion failed 'isContainable || supportsRegOptional' during 'Generate code' #78614
    8.0.0
  • JsonDeserializer.Deserialize throws "invalid start of a value" on a valid JSON #78611
  • Incorrect matching with RegexOptions.IgnoreCase #78609
  • [Analyzer] Using StartsWith instead of IndexOf == 0 #78608
    8.0.0
  • [Analyzer] string.ToLower() == otherString.ToLower() #78607
    8.0.0
  • [Analyzer] Recommend string.ToLower{Invariant}().Contains/IndexOf/StartsWith("lowercasestring") be replaced by case-insensitive comparison #78606
    8.0.0

Closed

  • [API Proposal]: Extend System.Net.Mime.MediaTypeNames #78458
    8.0.0
  • Websocket data received sometimes has an extra "}" at the end in .NET 7 #78345
    8.0.0
  • Significant Reverse(ReadOnlySpan<byte>) performance regression for certain sizes #78604
  • [libraries-pgo] Assert failure: Reached the "unreachable" in getArrayOrStringLength #77968
    8.0.0
  • System.Data.OleDb exception: OleDbDataAdapter internal error: invalid row set accessor: Ordinal=3 Status=UNSUPPORTEDCONVERSION. #29650
    Future
  • Archlinux - Enable Support #5646
    Future

PullRequests

Created

  • Remove enumerator allocation in for (HashSet, HashSet) comparisons in SetEquals and IsProperSupersetOf. #78613
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • More robust handling of CERT_CONTEXT with multiple threads #78612
    area-System.Security
  • Update APICompat to be able to pass in multiple suppression files #78610
    area-Infrastructure-libraries

Merged

  • Allow inline relocations in dehydrated data #78545
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Revert "Improve Span.Reverse fast path performance" #78605
    area-System.Memory
  • Check field's real type before we call getArrayOrStringLength #78601
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Make JIT<->EE printing methods consistent and support nested classes when printing class names #76505
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Replace MD5 with MurmurHash3_128 in SPMI #78527
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • Add IndexOfAnyValues #78093
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Fix build error when enabling interpreter #78085
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix arithmetic overflow in Queue<T>'s MoveNext() #78600
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • Pod Updates November 2022 #78603
    documentation, area-Meta, 8.0.0
  • Replacing exception strings with those stored in the resx file (#34056) #78341
    area-CoreLib-mono, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 8.0.0
  • Use ASCII strings in source files #78265
    area-Meta, community-contribution
  • Implement Shuffle, GetString, and GetItems on Random{NumberGenerator} #78598
    area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • Fold "cns"[cns] for ROS<char> #78593
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • SPMI: Avoid duplicate key lookups on replay #78597
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Cache GenericTypeDefinition to improve perf #78288
    area-System.Reflection, tenet-performance, community-contribution
  • SPMI: Implement fallback schema layout #78594
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix CPU_COUNT check for FreeBSD 13.1+ #77867
    os-freebsd, area-Build-mono, community-contribution
  • avoid allocations in SendTo and Quic #78591
    area-System.Net.Sockets
  • [mono][interp] Remove an assertion. #78596
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Add XxHash128 #77944
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • [JIT] X64/ARM64 - Minor optimizations for small types on `ADD`, `SUB`, `MUL`, `AND`, `OR`, `XOR`, `NOT`, `NEG` #77874
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
